org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client

Interface Ingest

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DocumentIngest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIngestClient, BulkClient, IngestClient, MockBulkClient, MockIngestClient

    public interface Ingest
extends DocumentIngest
    Interface for providing convenient ingest methods.
